summary: Experienced QA Automation Engineer with 5+ years of QA experience across SaaS and mobile platforms. Expert in manual and automated testing, including Selenium, Playwright, and SQL-based data validation. Proven success collaborating with product and engineering teams to deliver high-quality web and mobile applications. Skilled in root cause analysis, test planning, and improving SDLC processes with a focus on quality and performance. Strong in Agile, metrics-driven QA strategy, and continuous improvement.
summary_short: Senior QA Automation Engineer skilled in scalable test automation and CI/CD integration for SaaS platforms.

experience.summary: Built Cypress-based UI/API frameworks for microservice-driven SaaS platforms.
highlights: Integrated test suites into GitHub Actions and Azure DevOps for CI/CD
Reduced test flakiness by 82% and regression cycles by 8+ days/month
Developed reusable plugin-based test architecture across CRM/LMS platforms
Implemented Applitools for visual testing and Axe DevTools for accessibility
Defined company-wide API test strategy using Postman and Cypress
Created dashboards for test coverage, defect trends, and run time metrics
Mentored junior QA engineers and led testing best practices sessions
Executed manual and automated tests for SaaS and mobile platforms, increasing issue detection rate by 20%
Led root cause analysis sessions and contributed to SDLC improvements for quality-focused delivery
Authored comprehensive test plans and test cases aligned with Agile requirements
Wrote and executed complex SQL queries for backend data validation
Built and maintained automation for 40+ Drupal/Laravel platforms with Codeception
Reduced regression risk by enforcing CI-integrated QA gates
Collaborated in Agile sprints to align QA and dev velocity
Led QA for USPS.com and Verizon digital campaigns
Delivered functional, regression, and accessibility test coverage
Designed and executed test plans for web apps and APIs
Developed integration test coverage for CMS and database layers
Delivered QA for NIH, NCI, and GlaxoSmithKline in Agile environments
Led QA validation for CMS-based marketing sites
Performed cross-browser and functional testing aligned to specs
Created test plans for sites like NPR, Peace Corps, and Kennedy Center
Led full-scope QA for HTML/CSS-based applications

certificates.name: Black Box Software Testing: Foundation Certificate
